title: Super Spacious 3Bed 2Bath Ukrainian Village
posting_body: Super Spacious 3Bedroom 2Bathroom unit currently being renovated and available for an August move in!

Experience living in this totally awesome unit with 15ft ceilings, a wide spacious living room area, a hallway that leads to two full size bathrooms, including dual vanity sinks and spa-like showers, and 3 Large bedrooms with great closet space.
Kitchen is being completely updated with modern white cabinetry and ample counter space to come including room for an eat-in dining table.

In-unit laundry, updated hardwood flooring in a lighter buffed shade, new electrical, new blinds, new doors, central AC & Heat, and walkable to Wicker Park, Division Street restaurant row, CTA transportation, and more!
Pet friendly with some breed restrictions.
*Pictures are of the before renovation and the current progress of the rehab.
Schedule an appointment to come see the unit for the best sense of the space!
